axisContent.description: Component to override the tooltip content when triger is set to 'axis'.

classes.description: Override or extend the styles applied to the component.

itemContent.description: Component to override the tooltip content when triger is set to 'item'.

trigger.description: Select the kind of tooltip to display - 'item': Shows data about the item below the mouse. - 'axis': Shows values associated with the hovered x value - 'none': Does not display tooltip

root.description: Styles applied to the root element.
